REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2345 reute d f BC-MANUFACTURERS-<MHC>-I 04-07 0050

TEXT.TITLE: MANUFACTURERS <MHC> IN BUILDING FORECLOSURE
TEXT.BODY: Manufacturers Hanover Corp said its OFP Inc unit acquired a Dallas office building through foreclosure. The company said it foreclosed on the Allied Bank Tower, a 1.2 mln-square-feet office building at One Fountain Place, Dallas. Reuter
